title: Finding out the pattern with Pascal's Triangle.
text: We know that the variabels in this pattern will follow the pattern in Pascal's triangle. You should use the row of Pascal's triangle where the second number is 5.

title: Finding out the coefficients.
text: The coefficients according to Pascal's triangle are 1, 5, 10, 10, 5, 1.

title: Expanding the polynomial.
text: Use the formula: $${\left(a+b\right)}^n$$ $$=$$ $$a^n$$ + $$___a^n-1b^1$$ + $$___a^n-2b^2$$ +... + $$___a^1 b^n-1$$ + $$b^n$$ and fill in the blanks with the values from Pascal's triangle.

title: Plugging in the coefficients.
text: Plug in the x, y, and coefficents.

title: Simplify the equation.
text: Simplifying the equation results in the solution: $$x^5+10x^4+40x^3+80x^2+80x^1+32$$.
